backend/main.mo: Empty Motoko actor with no functionality.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report describing a footer credit update and related files and components.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Mapping of frontend file paths to short summaries of their purpose and behavior.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base styles defining color tokens, theming variables, and global element styling.
frontend/index.html: Minimal HTML document loading the React app root and main script.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Renders the main CapClickerView and the CursorMotionTrail overlay.
frontend/src/features/game/CapClickerVie: Full game UI layout handling stats, clicking, upgrade purchasing, animations, and number formatting.
frontend/src/features/game/components/Cl: Floating animated feedback element showing caps gained per click and auto-fading.
frontend/src/features/game/components/Cu: Canvas-based cursor trail effect that animates blur particles based on pointer velocity.
frontend/src/features/game/components/Sm: Custom scroll wrapper adding smooth animated wheel scrolling with reduced-motion support.
frontend/src/features/game/components/Up: Displays an upgrade’s name, description, cost, level, and purchase button with affordability indicators.
frontend/src/features/game/upgrades.ts: Defines the Upgrade interface and lists click and automation upgrade configurations with costs and effects.
frontend/src/features/game/useCapClicker: Implements game state management hook handling clicks, upgrade purchases, and idle cap generation.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor based on the user's Internet Identity, refreshing dependent queries on change.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides context and hooks for managing Internet Identity authentication and stored credentials.
frontend/src/hooks/usePrefersReducedMoti: Detects and tracks the user's reduced-motion preference via a media query.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Placeholder file exporting nothing since the game uses only local state.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind base styles and custom theme tokens, including game-specific UI styling.
frontend/src/lib/utils.ts: Exports a utility function that merges class names using clsx and tailwind-merge.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with Internet Identity and React Query providers.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration extending theme colors, components, animations, and enabling plugins.
project_state.json: Defines the project’s state, including schema version, game summary, architectural notes, and a list of implemented features for the Cap Clicker game. Primarily serves as a manifest of completed features, metadata, and progression design details.
